name: Best Nest Quest
description:
Play as Zest, a pecking bird with a taste for adventure!! Get ready to Jump, Peck, and Glide your way to the top of the world(and even Space!). By going through challenging levels in a Retro-like 2D platformer!

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z - Jump/Glide
  • X - Peck

Gamepad Controls:

  • LStick/Dpad - Move
  • A - Jump/Glide
  • X - Peck
